Name: Oxley
Description:
The Division of Oxley consists of:

  • part of the Brisbane City Council,
  • part of the Ipswich City Council, and
  • part of the Logan City Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: Railway workshops, industrial, light industrial and commercial activities.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of John Joseph Oxley, 1784-1828, considered to be one of the greatest explorers and early pioneers of Southern Queensland.
Members:
Dick, M (ALP) 2016-
Ripoll, B (ALP) 1998-2016
Hanson, P (IND) 1996-1998
Scott, L J (ALP) 1988-1996
Hayden, B G (ALP) 1961-1988
Cameron, D A (LP) 1949-1961
DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion
